CN.content:

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

| Material Name |
| --- |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

The two entities "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM" are the only valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. The other terms, such as "1 : 3 (w/w)" and "TCB solutions", do not refer to material names.
